original_title: Man found murdered with throat slit in Thalangama
original_body_lines: A person has been found murdered, after having his throat slashed with a sharp weapon near a garage in the Aruppitiya area of Thalangama this morning (Aug 18).
Police said that the place of residence of the victim, identified as a 45-year-old three-wheeler driver, has not yet been revealed.
The motive behind the murder and the identity of the suspects are yet to be uncovered.
